article_title: Morningstar: Tapping Returns in Health-Care ETFs

article_metadata.author: Johanna Bennett

og.description: Since the start of 2014, the U.S. health-care sector has outpaced the broader stock market with the S&P 500 Healthcare Index besting the S&P 500 by more than 400 basis points and continuing a trend that has stretched over the past several years. According to Morningstar.com, fund flows have been very strong into the health-care […]
